exclusion.criterion: Tumor stadified T4 with en-bloc resection
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Any psychological, familial, sociological or geographical condition potentially hampering compliance with the study protocol or follow-up schedule
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has undergone XRT. They have worsening dysphagia for solids and poor oral intake, which may impact their ability to comply with the study protocol.
